|rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = 800 |rad2n = 600 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Renamed as the ''Covr AC2600 Seamless Wi-Fi Router (COVR-2600R)'' *[http://us.dlink.com/press-centre/press-releases/covr/ ''New D-Link Covr Wi-Fi System Delivers Seamless High-Power Wi-Fi
Throughout Entire Home'' on '''D-Link (US)'''] Part of the [http://us.dlink.com/products/connect/covr-ac3900-whole-home-wi-fi-system/ ''Covr AC3900 Whole Home Wi-Fi System (COVR-3902)''] including: * Covr AC2600 Seamless Wi-Fi Router (COVR-2600R) * Covr AC1300 Seamless Wi-Fi Range Extender (COVR-1300E) ==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.techhive.com/article/3153887/network-router/d-links-covr-home-networking-line-router-with-wireless-powerline-extenders.html ''D-Linkâ€™s Covr home networking line pairs a high-end router with
wireless and powerline range extenders'' on '''TechHive'''] :'''D-Link Covr AC3900 Whole Home Wi-Fi System (COVR-3902)''' :The Covr Wi-Fi Kit (DKT-883) consists of a :*D-Link DIR-883 rev A1 - ''AC2600 MU-MIMO Dual-band Router'' and :*[[D-Link DAP-1655 rev A1]] - ''AC1300 Gigabit Wi-FI Extender'' ==See also== *[[D-Link DHP-W732AV]] - ''Covr PowerLine AV2 1300 Adapter'' *[[List of Wireless Systems]] *[[D-Link COVR series]] [[Category:English Documentation]]
